reviews.text: I initially stayed at the Highfield House due to its proximity to the town and to the golf course. I keep returning because of its superior accommodations and breakfasts. Isla has made us feel welcome.
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.text: I've been to Highfield House on at least half a dozen occasions in the past couple of years - while visiting my very ill mother in Dornoch, sometimes on my own, sometimes with my sister and brother-in-law.
reviews.title: Wonderful - go there!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's very comfortable, very friendly, lovely rooms, marvellous breakfasts - I particularly like the fresh fruit salad and the scrambled eggs with smoked salmon.
reviews.title: It does not get better than this

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We like it so much, we are going again later in the year, even though our mother is no longer there.
reviews.title: Winter wonderland and warm welcome

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for my friends wedding in Dornoch and stumbled upon Highfield House's website and the reviews on Trip Advisor convinced me to book. I'm so glad I did. Isla and her husband were so welcoming after the long train journey, and were such lovely hosts. The B&B was so cosy and inviting, I instantly felt at home and relaxed. The room I was given looked out onto the sea and was such a lovely view, the decor was traditional but modern all the same, with lots of lovely touches here and there, I loved it. The breakfast was lovely too, with so much choice. I definatley felt it was value for money staying at Highfiedl and would definatley go back if I was ever in Dornoch.
reviews.title: Warm welcome at Highfield House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Isla and Hugh are charming and friendly hosts who make Highfield House one of the very best B & B establishments we have experienced. The accomodation is exceptionally spacious and comfortable with lovely views south over Dornoch Firth.
reviews.title: Faultless!

reviews.text: Isla provides a wide choice for breakfast using the best of ingredients so the quality and quantity cannot be faulted.
reviews.title: Top quality accomodation with fabulous breakfast and charming hostess

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If requested, Isla can recommend restaurants in the area for evening meals as well as provide wider tourist information.
reviews.title: Totally 100% Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at Highfield House in Dornoch several times both on business and on holiday and have always been made to feel really at home. Extremely comfortable and stylish accomodation including high quality beds and furnishings. The lady who runs it is charming, helpful and friendly and a mine of very useful information on the area. The breakfast is an absolute treat.
reviews.title: Simply The Best !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Highfield is a 1st class B&B. Our room was spotlessly clean and the quality of the bedding was fantastic.
reviews.title: Excellent Bed and Breakfast.
